title: The Brighton Boys in the Radio Service
creator: James Driscoll
description: LibriVox recording of The Brighton Boys in the Radio Service, by James Driscoll. Read by Tom Clifton. The Brighton Boys in the Radio Service is a boys adventure story set in WWI - Three College Chums join the military and face the perils of spies, submarines and enemy soldiers in the trenches of embattled Europe. An engaging story set in a period where good guys wore white hats, bad guys wore black hats and every chapter ends with a cliffhanger so you have to come back for more! (Summary by Tom Clifton) M4B format available For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobook; fiction; WWI; world war 1; youth fiction; adventure; boys fiction; fiction; war stories
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
